skill.name: youtrack
skill.description: Interacts with YouTrack issue tracker for IdeaVim. Use when working with tickets (VIM-XXXX), adding comments, managing tags, setting status, or release management. This project does NOT use GitHub Issues - use YouTrack instead.
skill.summary: Interacts with YouTrack issue tracker for IdeaVim. Use when working with tickets (VIM-XXXX), adding ...
skill.author: JetBrains

security_audit.summary: Only documentation is present in the skill directory. No executable code, network calls, or file access patterns are defined here.

content.value_statement: Tracking IdeaVim tickets can be slow without direct YouTrack actions. This skill guides CLI commands to comment, tag, and manage VIM issues.
actual_capabilities: Add public or private comments to VIM tickets
Add tags to VIM tickets by tag ID
Remove tags from VIM tickets by tag ID
Set ticket status with a status name
Get ticket details with optional JSON output
limitations: Works only with YouTrack VIM tickets

use_cases.title: Update ticket status
use_cases.description: Set a ticket to Ready To Release after verifying a fix.

use_cases.title: Request clarification
use_cases.description: Add a private comment and pending clarification tag.

use_cases.title: Prepare a version
use_cases.description: Create or delete YouTrack release versions.

prompt_templates.title: Find a ticket
prompt_templates.prompt: Get details for VIM-1234 and include the JSON output.

prompt_templates.title: Add a comment
prompt_templates.scenario: You want to update a ticket
prompt_templates.prompt: Add a public comment to VIM-1234 saying the fix is ready for review.

prompt_templates.title: Tag for analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Add the claude-analyzed tag to VIM-1234.

prompt_templates.title: Release workflow
prompt_templates.prompt: Set VIM-1234 status to Ready To Release and set fix version to 2.29.0.

output_examples.input: Add the pending clarification tag to VIM-1234 and leave a private note for Aleksei.
output: Command to add tag: npx tsx scripts-ts/src/youtrack-cli/add-tag.ts VIM-1234 68-507582
Command to add private comment: npx tsx scripts-ts/src/youtrack-cli/add-comment.ts VIM-1234 "@Aleksei.Plate I need clarification: ..." --private

best_practices: Verify ticket ID starts with VIM- before running commands
Use private comments for internal discussion
Keep release version names consistent with the project
anti_patterns: Using GitHub issue commands for this project
Posting sensitive details in public comments
Setting status without confirming release criteria

faq.question: Is this compatible with GitHub Issues?
faq.answer: No. This skill targets YouTrack and VIM ticket IDs only.

faq.question: What are the main limits?
faq.answer: You need YOUTRACK_TOKEN and the CLI scripts in the repo.

faq.question: Can I integrate with other tools?
faq.answer: Yes, you can call the CLI scripts from other workflows.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: The skill is documentation only and does not transmit data.

faq.question: What if a command fails?
faq.answer: Check token validity, ticket ID, and script path.

faq.question: How is this different from generic trackers?
faq.answer: It is tailored to YouTrack VIM workflows and tag IDs.
